name: Hovver
description:
This is a small prototype I made have a go at making a physics based control scheme where you control each engine individually. The There is no exact goal of in this game,

you can try to master the controls a flyaround the level. 

you can use and a controller and keyboard  to play,

controller:  each analog controls and engines on each side.

Keyboard: WASD for left side engines, & IJKL or ↑↓←→  for right side engines.

Feedback is all I ask.
